GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: accepts a topic object and posts it in the database

topic.description: Let's build a cabin in the woods!!

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of objects with all the users

POST /api/users.description: accepts a user object and posts it in the users table of the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an objects of the required user

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the required article with the addition of comment_count

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: it can increment or decrement the votes of the required article and serves it back updated in an object

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: removes an article entry from the database in conjunction with its comments

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves and array with all the article comments

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: it accepts an object with a username and body properties and creates a new comment on the mentioned article, it returns the comment back
